Create a scavenger hunt game that leads players on a journey to find different types of umbrellas from around the world.
Organize a virtual exhibition that showcases the history and evolution of umbrellas from ancient times to modern designs.
Develop an app that generates personalized umbrella designs based on the user's preferences and style.
Host a workshop where participants can learn how to make their own umbrellas from scratch using sustainable materials.
Create a virtual reality experience that transports users to different cities around the world and challenges them to navigate through rainy weather while using unique umbrella designs.
